page.title: 05Boys playground games
page.content: {Bulldog}-2 lines are used.Every one not on stands behind 1 line.Someone on calls a name & tries to tig the named person,when they fail or succeed,the rest dash across. {Dead mans fall}-Someone chooses a weapon to pretend to kill the others.They fall,the most dramatic fall wins,he then shoots the others. {Conkers}-2 people have horse chestnuts on strings.1 of the conkers is held stil,the other person tries to hit & split the other conker. {Marbles}-Many variations on marbles played.One way is to roll the marble & try to hit the other,if you hit it you have won both marbles. {Trumps}-A set of cards with writing on is bought.Others guess what the card is.Whoever gets all the cards wins. {Other games}(in order of popularity) -Football,rounders,tig,slides,chase.
